full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement for Public Opinion Research
========================================================

### Synopsis
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide public opinion research services on behalf of the Privy Council Office (PCO).

### Description
The successful contractor will be responsible for collecting and analyzing qualitative data on Canadian views regarding various national issues. This will involve gaining an in-depth understanding of Canadians' perceptions of government priorities, their expectations of government actions, and perspectives on government communication strategies.
